stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Phishing Email with a Wire Transfer Theme and Bank Account Information
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: On 01 December 2014, a phishing email was sent from rfitzgerald@semgrroupcorp.com with the subject "Wire Transfer". In the domain semgrroupcorp.com, note the double "r", was intended to appear from an energy sector entity. The email included the .pdf file McGUIRE WIRING INSTRUCTION. It included directions to perform a wire transfer to an individual's bank account.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description:

---- BEGIN EMAIL BODY ---- Jerry,
Process a wire of $28,655.00 to the account information attached. Code to Professional services and send me the confirmation when completed.
Thanks, Bob

Mc GUIRE WIRING INSTRUCTION Bank Name: Wells Fargo 1459 Moreland Ave, Atlanta, GA 30316 Account Number: [REDACTED] Routing Number: 121000248 Amount: $28,655.00 Credit To: [REDACTED] [REDACTED] Atlanta, GA 30316
